abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Second Cities and
            Villages Development Bank Project are: (i) to support the
            Government's efforts to improve living standards in
            Jordan's less developed outer regions; (ii) to continue
            to facilitate the execution of municipal and village
            development plans by funding well-appraised projects; (iii)
            to strengthen the Cities and Villages Development
            Bank's institutional capacity; and (iv) to support
            CVDB's role in organizing financial training for local
            government personnel. The project components include a line
            of credit to CVDB, representing 75 percent of CVDB's
            foreign exchange needs from mid-1985 to end-1987;equipment
            and technical assistance for CVDB; and training for local
            government and CVDB personnel.
